name: Massimo Vignelli
biography: Worked with wife, Lella Vignelli. Co-founded Lella and Massimo Vignelli Office of Design and Architecture, 1960 in Milan. Co-founded Unimark International, 1965 in Chicago. Co-founded Vignelli Associates, 1971 in New York. Was head of graphic design and advertising for Knoll International, appointed 1965.
